DOC.brief_summary: The aim prospective study evaluate clinical performance filcon IV1 toric ocufilcon D toric contact lenses 1 week wear pair .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Performance Toric Hydrogel Contact Lenses Following One Week Daily Wear
DOC.detailed_description: This 30-subject , prospective , randomize , double mask , bilateral , 1 week cross-over study compare fit characteristic filcon IV1 toric lenses ocufilcon D hydrogel toric lens .
DOC.criteria: A person eligible inclusion study he/she : Is 18 40 year age ( inclusive ) Has selfreported visual exam last two year Is adapt soft toric contact lens wearer Has contact lens spherical prescription +6.00 9.00 ( inclusive ) Have less 0.75D astigmatism 2.00 D eye . Can achieve best correct spectacle distance visual acuity 20/25 ( 0.10 logMAR ) good eye . Can achieve distance visual acuity 20/30 ( 0.18 logMAR ) good eye study contact lens . Has clear cornea active ocular disease Has read , understood sign information consent letter . Patient contact lens refraction fit within available parameter study lens . Is willing comply wear schedule ( least 5 day per week , > 8 hours/day assume contraindication ) . Is willing comply visit schedule A person exclude study he/she : Has CL prescription outside range available parameter study lens . Has spectacle cylinder less 0.75D 2.00 D cylinder either eye . Has history achieve comfortable CL wear ( 5 day per week ; > 8 hours/day ) Has contact lens best correct distance vision bad 20/25 ( 0.10 logMAR ) either eye . Presence clinically significant ( grade 24 ) anterior segment abnormality Presence ocular systemic disease need medication might interfere contact lens wear . Confidential EXMKTG66 Clinical Performance Toric Hydrogel Contact Lenses Following One Week Daily Wear 10 Slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear : Pathological dry eye associate finding Pterygium , pinguecula , corneal scar within visual axis Neovascularization > 0.75 mm limbus Giant papillary conjunctivitis ( GCP ) bad grade 1 Anterior uveitis iritis ( past present ) Seborrheic eczema , Seborrheic conjunctivitis History corneal ulcer fungal infection Poor personal hygiene Has know history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) Has aphakia , keratoconus highly irregular cornea . Has Presbyopia dependence spectacle near work contact lens . Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is participate type eye related clinical research study .
